name: Cube Magik
overview: A Match-the-tiles puzzle game, published in 64'er 1994/05, 64'er 1998/09 and 64'er 1998/10. Rubik's Cube fascinates the masses. This is also shown by "Cube Magick", our program of the month, which is based on the idea of the Hungarian toy puzzle. You have the opportunity to select the music for each game, to make the game more fun. Passwords are given out by level so you can instantly teleport back to your last success.
